Reviews.Title: Lens missing and cheap quality bag
Reviews.Author: Pritraj
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera last week, no doubt the camera is awesome and one of the best in the price range, the reason I'm giving 3 rating is because of the seller. When i opened the box, .45x lens were missing and it was a surprise to see the lenses were in back order. If that was the case the seller should have intimated at the time of purchase or at-least before shipping. When I contacted the seller, I was told it will take 2 weeks for lens to arrive plus the shipping time. I'm still waiting for my lens.Secondly the bag is of the cheapest quality one can find in the market, I would avoid carrying such an expensive camera in a cheap bag and risk a fall.Basically the bag is cheap and also the extra battery is of some cheap quality, not the OEM canon battery.

Reviews.Title: In a word, Awesome.
Reviews.Author: ktward
Reviews.Content: Technically, I can't call myself a "professional" photographer because I've never personally sold my work-- though as a graphic designer and Advertising/Marketing Manager, my work has indeed been utilized professionally.I have been an avid and artistic photography amateur for decades, starting with the Canon AE-1 Program that I received as a wedding gift way back in 1983. (Amusingly, it was a gift from my new brothers-in-law at the behest of my new husband, but it was I who wielded it from Day One until it finally gave up the ghost some 20 years later. I clung to that camera longer than I did that husband.)The T3i exceeds all of my expectations. The Program mode is super convenient and superbly intuitive for times when I don't feel like futzing around with settings--like when my college-aged kids recently visited me for Winter Vaca here in Puerto Rico. But when I'm scouting on my own with both tripod and time on my hands, I have every customizable bell & whistle I could ever want immediately at hand. Nikon's good, no question, but Canon's utility and lenses rock.All of that said, after considerable research I knew that I wanted the T3i (more affordable but in every way that matters equally as functional as the pricier Canon models) well before I ran across Cameta Camera on Amazon. All I can say is that they offered not only the best kit prices that I found, but also a uniquely diverse range of kits to suit any enthusiast's particular needs.

Reviews.Title: Great product....not happy with the seller
Reviews.Author: NB "Michigan Man"
Reviews.Content: I bought this item from Cameta Camera. The product is excellent and the bundle is great. All the accessories seem to be pretty good. But the bundle came with one lens missing. On checking the shipping sheet, it said that that lens was on back order. I wish I had known when I placed my order. This is deception of the worst kind. I am very displeased with the seller. Amazon needs to better regulate these guys and make them follow ethical selling practices.

Reviews.Title: the bundle is worth the money
Reviews.Author: Walten P Owens
Reviews.Content: the canon Rebel T3i and canon factory lenses are great as expected. This bundled package that cost less than the two lenses and camera body combined just made it so much sweeter. Granted most of the bundled items are cheap knock offs, but you are practically getting them for free so I can’t complain. The memory card is a necessity and the remote shutter something I would have bought anyway. The memory card reader works well if you don’t have a card reader port on your computer otherwise its useless. I haven’t tried the flash and may never will because the built in flash seems to do everything I need. The bag, spare battery, cleaning kit (q-tips), and lcd protectors and UV filters are a nice perk. The additional (precision design) lenses that screw onto the canon lenses are fun to play with for a day but I will probably never use them again. Moral of the story: The Canon Camera  (camera comes will battery, charger, and electrical cords), two entry level base models lenses, remote shutter, UV filters and memory card are worth more than the price of the bundle. Everything else is great fun to play with and nice to have but mainly cheap quality products  to help persuade you to make the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with speedy service
Reviews.Author: MissM
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera package deal thru Amazon on Tuesday and got it 2 days later. Very fast service. Well worth the money I spent on getting it here just in time for a holiday weekend. Everything that was in the bundle package came with it.. No back orders... Took no time to charge up the battery and start snapping photos. This is a great camera! I would also buy from this company again.

Reviews.Title: In my opinion, best bundle value on Amazon
Reviews.Author: ashorton21
Reviews.Content: I obviously knew what I was going to get with a Canon DSLR, but none of the accessories included are anything short of satisfactory. I was originally a little bit skeptical about the camera bag and extra battery, but both seem to be of sufficient quality. The battery may "feel" slightly cheaper than the Canon battery that comes in the T3i box, but works to the same degree nonetheless. I haven't put the cleaning kit or the SD card reader to the test (no need to - my computer has an SD reader built in), but will update if I do use them. NOTE: The SD card reader I received from my seller (Cameta Camera) was the Zeikos USB 2.0 reader, not the white one pictured in the bundle. The shutter release remote, flash, telephoto and macro lenses, screen protectors, UV filters, memory card wallet, lenses, and the camera itself have so far exceeded my expectations.The only thing I would recommend to the sellers is that instead of including 2 UV filters, add an extra $5-10 to the bundle and send the Vivitar 58mm lens filter kit with UV, Polarizer, and Fluorescent filters.

Reviews.Title: Canon T3i plus accessories
Reviews.Author: GeneJim
Reviews.Content: The camera is great, generally, but has some strange quirks--examples: having to cover the eyepiece when self-timing, and, in most modes, having it autofocus on the nearest object (even if not the object of interest). Making the various settings are too complicated--Canon needs to have a point and shoot expert work on simplifying them--and many (most?) of the settings are unnecessary. The 18-55 mm lens needs to be sharp enough at all focal lengths that full size pictures are not degraded; the 75-300 mm lens does not seem to have this defect, but it is not an IS (shake reducing) lens. ISO 400 is as good as ISO 100, and the 3200 and 6400 ISO images are surprisingly good. The auxiliary 2.5x lens gives sharp images in the center of the field but that drops off quickly and sharply away from center. I was never able to get the auxiliary wide angle lens to screw into the front of either lens, so I doubt that I'll ever use either. Remote control works only with 10 second self-timer. Other items seem fine. Haven't used the extra flash yet but have put the filters on both lenses. Extra battery is welcome. I wish I had bought the camera with the 18-135 mm regular lens or a telephoto lens with focal length overlapping the 18-55 mm lens.

Reviews.Title: GREAT VALUE.....GREAT ITEM!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: onemssassy
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE this package. I got everything I needed and more for one price, that was not much higher than the actual cost of the camera! You have the lens you need no matter what picture you want to take...took great shots of a ballgame at Met Life Stadium from 5 rows from the top...zoom lens is GREAT! I highly recommend this package even for beginners...a great package to grow and learn with!

Reviews.Title: First major Camera 4 me!
Reviews.Author: Jayr
Reviews.Content: Had this item for only for less than a month and so far I am very happy. I thought i was going to get some cheap items with the camera cause most web sites post the camera cost more than the bundle, LOL! But to my surprise most of the items that came with it looked very nice. The flash and bag looked very cheap but i can deal with that. I am not a professional photographer but so far my pictures have been great. I had a friend with the Nikon D4200 and he was impressed with the pictures as well as what i paid for it (thank you Audio Video Express) I was very worried about the reviews from other sites but i took a chance and i am very happy. I hope to take some great pictures and post them here in the future to show.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i
Reviews.Author: ADE "don ramon"
Reviews.Content: The contents on the case came as advertised, the body, filter, 16GB card, telephoto lens, battery, accessory kit were fine except for the flash which I found to be too cheap in quality.  I could have paid more for a better quality flash since I prioritize it to give quality pictures.  With the price, it is good enough.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis Wells
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera because i felt it was time to take the next step in my photography hobby.it was a great deal with a lot of extras.it was purchased through amazon from the cameta camera store in new york.i am pleased with my purchase and the camera is fantastic.the 2x telephoto lens isn't all that and i purchased a teleconverter later that really does the job.all in all this is a great deal on a great camera.i really liked the 75mm-300mm lens.the camera and lenses separately would cost a lot more.

Reviews.Title: I'd buy this again - from this seller!
Reviews.Author: PajamaGuy "PJ"
Reviews.Content: This kit came exactly as advertised.I have since purchased other items from Cameta Camera as well as have had a technical question/complaint handled most satisfactorily by their customer service.  I will not hesitate to purchase from Cameta again.Me: I got into photography while serving with USAF in Germany in the 1970’s.  I have a Pentax SLR and several thousand$ of Takumar lenses, as well as the full suite of B&W; developing equipment. I’m as antique as my Pentax and I’m not a professional – my wife exhibits better composition ability with her point-and-shoot.  I’ve been through at least a dozen P&S; cameras over the last 20 years, most in the $300-500 range, and still carry one in my pocket when a DSLR is just too big.  I wanted to get back into the SLR realm with the changeable lenses, increased creativity potential, and my favorite attribute – really shallow DEPTH OF FIELD!The Kit: The T3i is an excellent DLSR for me. It has more automatic and manual functionality than I’ve ever had – and the Canon suite of lenses and accessories should satisfy the novice as well as the professional, and everyone in-between – and their respective wallet$.The lenses are very good Canon lenses – as is most of the kit.  However, the flash unit while usable, doesn’t “talk” to the T3i.  You have to set the flash manually.  I bought the Canon SpeedLite 320EX from Cameta ($149 delivered).The 2x Telephoto adapter does NOT work with the 75-300 lens. (it won’t focus MF or AF).  When I emailed Cameta, they responded almost immediately with the phone number of their customer service guy, Rich.  I left a message and Rich called me back within an hour, explaining that the included instructions indicated the 2x adapter would not work with the longer lenses AND he offered to refund that portion of my purchase. ($28 for the .45 & 2x pair).The case, card, battery, filters, and remote are all of good quality and function as expected.Unless you’re already an expert professional, I recommend reading David Busch’s “Canon EOS Rebel T3i/600D Guide to Digital SLR Photography”. It’s 455 pages and affords the reader the ability to dive as deep as you want into the features & functions of the T3i.So after a few weeks, several basketball games, and over 3,000 shots, if I had it to do over again, I’d certainly buy the T3i fromCameta, but I’d look for a slightly different kit – because I won’t be using the flash or the lens adapters.PJ

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: RandallM "RandallM"
Reviews.Content: For the price you can't beat this camera.  Everyone that see's it wants to steal it from me.  Takes awesome pics, and easy to work.  Really a nice Christmas gift from my wife who always out does me.  Great for a professional starter camera, but you'll need a better carrying case for it.  The one they send is too small for all of the stuff you get.  The company that sold this is AWESOME.  You can't go wrong with this product or the company that is selling it!  Very nice to deal with on the phone!  Thanks guys, you rock!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Samuel Slater
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was expecting. Everything is functional. Couldn't have asked for anything better. I use the camera everyday. Very high quality.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera!!
Reviews.Author: Alicia Whitley
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera!!  You can do so many things with this camera!  Great beginners camera who is serious about picture taking!

Reviews.Title: photography
Reviews.Author: Mauricio
Reviews.Content: The product offered is 100%, the accessories come in handy to protect the lens and camera from dust and dirt. sony cameras such semi, you should have notion of how to use it to take photographs. I highly recommend this camera for its definition in photographic quality and accessories.

Reviews.Title: Jim
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I think the rebel T3I is a very good camera I have my since Thanksgiving never had any problems with it the only thing I don't care about it is the manual that come with the camera is so small that I had to go to Canon website and look up the camera manual and printed it bigger so I could see it a lot better.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Phacetious Plebbe "Phacetious"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. I bought it for a newspaper photographer I know and she is consistently making use of it. I see the photos every time I buy the newspaper. Right now other photographers are asking her where they can buy one.I works, and I know this because I also have the same model. The items in the bundle were of overall decent quality, although some of them are just downright cheap. But it is a good package, and you will not regret the purchase of the bundle.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: WHITE TORNADO
Reviews.Content: I received this camera much more quickly than expected.  I did not think it would arrive in time for my vacation as I ordered it late, but it arrived several days before scheduled. I was so pleased.  Everything was in the box except the 16GB SD card.  It could have slipped out during shipping. I called the seller, Shop Deals USA.  The man answered even though it was a little late in the evening and sent one out right away.  I got it in just a few days.  I would not hesitate to purchase from this seller again.  The quality of all the lenses appear good. I could not decide between a couple of package deals and decided to go with the flash that could move with this package and I am very pleased.  I want to learn macro photography and this will be a great camera for it.  I still need to learn to use all the features on this camera but it is easy to start with and can do much more complex things as I learn more.  I love the 300 zoom. The flash can be used off the camera which I was not aware of.  I have an old cannon rebel eos 35 mm film camera that was the first fully automatic and fully manual camera they made.  My old lens fits and works on my new camera so I am happy to have a 3rd lens I can use.  I was not sure it would work, but the autofocus from the older camera works on this one.  The main reason I bought this was a review on you tube comparing this camera to some others and it explained that the video focusing on this one is actually better than the T4i.  It helped me make my decision.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Product
Reviews.Author: Jack Iseminger
Reviews.Content: I have been well pleased with all of the components of this bundle.  The case is too light weight for this good of an outfit but everything else seemed to work as expected or a little better than I had hoped.  When I got the unit, the flash did not work.  I contacted the seller who I found to be friendly and helpful, and the replacement flash worked very well.  Due to the case and the flash I cannot give it a 5 star.

Reviews.Title: great but not working now
Reviews.Author: Francesca A. Franco
Reviews.Content: I purchased this kit in June 2012.I would have given this camera and package five stars if not for the fact that my camera has begun to malfunction as of late...I have three canon lenses including the kit lens, and my camera seems to have an issue auto focusing when looking through the viewfinder (or works fine in live view and manual modes) with all three of them. I've done all Canon suggested troubleshooting including cleaning the contacts.Otherwise, the package is a great deal for all the things it comes with. It was still $900 when I purchased or because the t4i hadn't come out yet. The flash and all accessories worked rather well with the camera. The materials of the extra stuff seemed kind of cheap, but it was all basically free and everything worked.The extra battery might look cheap but lasts as long as the Canon one. In my opinion, this was the most valuable of all extra items.

Reviews.Title: A great package for the growing photographer
Reviews.Author: MediaMan
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this package in order to move up from using an outdated Canon SLR. I wanted the versatility that the T3i offers. However, I also wanted a lens such as the 75-300mm in this bundle for long-range shooting. Compared to retail prices, this package deal gives you the camera, standard lens, zoom lens, lens attachments, filters, flash, etc. for the normal price of the camera itself. Every accessory, save the bag, is superb. The only disappointment was the bag, as it could not hold anything more than the camera in an organized fashion--and there is little protection/cushion. However, this does not detract from the overall value of the package. If you're looking to buy a T3i, go with a bundle package like this.

Reviews.Title: Very good but not exceptional
Reviews.Author: Kener
Reviews.Content: The Macro and 2.5x extender:  the threads on the caps aren't exactly right.  It takes a while to work to get the caps back on so that the threads aren't ruined.  The 2.5x telephoto extender only works on the lower zoom lens NOT the telephoto which is where I would like to use it.  The Macro is good but not great.  That being said, it is probably my inexperience, not the lens.  The lens paper and cloth that are in the cleaning kit are usless - very cheap and leave lint like crazy.All that being said, I would still buy this again!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great bundle of accessories
Reviews.Author: Stefani Hathaway
Reviews.Content: I'm still very new to this camera and by no means an expert photographer, but thus far I'm getting great shots, and I've found it to be user-friendly and versatile.  The combination of lenses and accessories in this bundle allows for a wide variety of shots - it's a lot of fun to play with!

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Matt Mowery
Reviews.Content: THis has been a great purchase.  This package works great as a bundle, especially if you're just getting started in photography.  Easy to use and understand.

Reviews.Title: This camera is awesome
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this camera.  I've been looking at if for quite a while now and finally had the money to purchase it.  Plus with this bundle deal all of the extras just makes it that much better.  Great deal when compared individually

Reviews.Title: Great camera bundle!
Reviews.Author: CE
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera! It was a great buy with all the accessories. I'm not a professional photographer, but I do enjoy taking pictures. This is a great step-up from my last camera, and the picture quality is unbelievable.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: CSJD
Reviews.Content: Excellent! the case is a little big, but for the price of the hole thing is perfect! the accessories are good and the camera es great!

Reviews.Title: Great bundle...buy it!!!
Reviews.Author: Kristen
Reviews.Content: This bundle is AMAZING!!!  I am so glad I spent the money on this bundle!  Everything came in one box in about 3 days and works perfectly!  I am so pleased with this purchase!  Pics are great and all items in the bundle work great!  Such a great deal!!!

Reviews.Title: The best!
Reviews.Author: STAICHOKC
Reviews.Content: The kit is very good, canon T3i is incredible. images are used in newspapers and other printed with high quality.

Reviews.Title: Great bundle!
Reviews.Author: Unknown
Reviews.Content: I loved the camera because it offers a lot of feature. The items included are very nice and useful. The only accessory I don't like that much is the flash. It does feel a little cheap and mine has a little loose piece inside of it. It makes the pictures look bad with it, but maybe it's because I don't know how to use the flash. Overall, this is a great bundle to buy!

Reviews.Title: The best kit ever!
Reviews.Author: NSV
Reviews.Content: I totally recommend this kit for the amateurs who want to start with photography but with a small budget. This is the better deal I have find online so far.You won't be disappointed at all!

Reviews.Title: Loved it!
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: Great camara! and great price for the amount of things the kit comes with.The shiping was ok, I got it on time.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: R. Stone "tvrick"
Reviews.Content: Just didn't have instructions on how to uses the extra lenses it came with. Am very satisfied, but haven't had it long enough to really rate it for quality. But I bought this camera for the review it got.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: rodney oneal
Reviews.Content: This is a great package! anyone would love this camera! I would do it all over again!!! You wont be sorry!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: ISABELA
Reviews.Content: Really great promotion I really enjoy it it is a very good camara to satr getting into photography its a very good camera.

Reviews.Title: Best deal I could find for this camera
Reviews.Author: summer
Reviews.Content: Love it! Can't believe it comes with so much for this price. I did a lot of research and this was the best deal I could find for this camera. So far the images are excellent and it's very quick and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Greetings from Venezuela
Reviews.Author: Juan Jose Perez Rivero
Reviews.Content: I have received everything and everything in perfect condition.The camera works fineMemory Class 10 works perfectlyextra battery works as the original canon.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Wayne Nelson
Reviews.Content: The camera has performed well for indoor and outdoor photos, I would recommend this camera to any new photo buff...

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Alisha C.
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I wanted! The camera is amazing not to mention all of the extras they came with it. I started out with the Canon T3 and this is a step up for me. Very fast shipping and everything was packaged perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: hooked on books "Lynn"
Reviews.Content: I ordered on Saturday 1/4 and estimated shipping was to be between the 9th - 14th.  Received on the 9th and it was like Christmas all over again.  Couldn't wait to dig into it.  So far very pleased with the camera.  The flash works but does not work on the camera.  I'm hoping the one from my old Canon T70 will work on it.  The bag is not great but does have a lot of room and holds everything nicely.  Having just received yesterday I haven't had a lot of time to play around with any of the special features but can't wait to try them out this weekend.  So far the picture quality has been awesome.

Reviews.Title: Great camera package
Reviews.Author: CarolM
Reviews.Content: Great camera package, it included everything you would need to start taking pictures.  The Camera is auto if you want it to be, however it has so many features and settings if your skill set is higher than beginner. I would recommend this camera to anyone.I would recommend watching the 101 series offer by cannon, to anyone wanting to learn more about the setting on the camera and getting creative.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Oldtrainerguy
Reviews.Content: Shipping was delayed due to weather in the east. Everything as advertised. Bag is kinda cheap so I bought a different bag. So far so good

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: kgraber
Reviews.Content: Easy to use camera. The additional accessories make this a great value. Still getting used to using all the different lenses.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: md mozammal raju
Reviews.Content: it's really a good camera, it's resolution is really appreciable and gives fine images, I found  it awesome to work.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Irene Moore
Reviews.Content: This was a super Christmas gift.  With all that came in the package, there's very little we'll need to purchase until we're almost professionals!

Reviews.Title: Exceeded all expectations!
Reviews.Author: James L. Hamrick
Reviews.Content: The camera provides exceptional pictures, the instructions were accurate and easily followed.  Batteries are very long lasting! Anyone looking for high quality reasonably priced photography equipment should take a good look at this product.

Reviews.Title: Good Items
Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: All items meet my expectations...event there were 2 items looks different from display picture but overall its good item with a good price

Reviews.Title: More than I expected -- A great deal for me
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with this kit, and found the items both useful and adequate for my needs.  I am a professional photographer who works on the "cheap," shooting football, volleyball, wrestling, basketball, and track and field, as well as wildlife photography of large game animals on the move ,and lots of hobby photos.  I appreciate this camera's light weight, and versatility.  I was a good purchase decision for me.

Reviews.Title: Paid more for the same camera kit by ordering through Amazon.
Reviews.Author: G.Papadopoulos "markos96"
Reviews.Content: Paid more for the same camera kit through Amazon.I just purchased this bundle  through Amazon that was fulfilled by  Cameta Camera.  Ordering through Amazon cost me 20.00 more than ordering through Cameta Camers's website directly for the same camera kit.  Skip Amazon and order Directly through Cameta Camera for the better price.

Reviews.Title: First DSLR
Reviews.Author: msims
Reviews.Content: Good price for quality product. Useful accessories. Having fun learning the settings. Oops, more words required so here they are.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Rafael Iriarte
Reviews.Content: everything is fine except for the case, its regular I expected a more sport one but this is ok everything fits.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Janice Di Luzio-Bard
Reviews.Content: From the very first photos I took, the Rebel made a difference.  I looked like a pro!  It's easy.  It has great software and instructions with it.  I am still learning, but taking good pictures as I grow with my camera.  Sorry I waited so long to make the decision, but it was worth it.I did get my camera elsewhere and have two lenses.  One is image stabilized.  Really helps with pictures that  normally wouldn't turn out.  Took night photos that looked like daylight.

Reviews.Title: More than what I expected!
Reviews.Author: Garry Grissom
Reviews.Content: My order arrived the first day of the dealer estimated timespan, which I did not expect at all.I’m still learning to use all the new features on the camera, but everything is great. I’m old school and was reluctant to order this online, but it turned out okay. Very satisfied and will recommend this to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Canon T3i package
Reviews.Author: Customan66
Reviews.Content: There were several different packages so examine what your needs are and purchase accordingly.  This setup was exactly what I nedded and all of the equipment arrived in excellent condition, new in box.  Everything worked oerfectly and I almost take my bag everywhere I go.  Just great! I'm loving this camera and all of the extras that came with it.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: CARLOS BOTERO
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my son.  He is very happy with this gift because he is learning for take a good pictures

Reviews.Title: canon
Reviews.Author: Heather H
Reviews.Content: This kit is amazing. Especially for the price. Everything you need to get started except a tripod. Even the bag is of nice quality. Great picture quality and fairly easy to use for newbies wanting to try out photography.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i
Reviews.Author: Karen Retzlaff
Reviews.Content: I ordered the product on line with some reservation.  When it came, I began using it almost immediately.  It was very similar to the Canon EOS Rebel I already had and needed to replace.  It is easy to use and much faster to download photos from than my old camera.  The photos are sharp and can be enlarged quite a bit  without pixilating.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful options
Reviews.Author: C. Miller
Reviews.Content: This camera is everything the reviews say it is!  The package gave me all the options I was hoping for!

Reviews.Title: Love Rebel T3i
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love the camera and all the items that came with it. I had been looking to purchase an efficient back up to my Olympus for a while and nothing matched this in price which was so affordable!

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PACKAGE FOR STARTERS
Reviews.Author: Jkong
Reviews.Content: So it was about to 2 weeks ago when i ordered this package. It came a little later than it should've but when I got the package and I was very satisfied. Camera is great and so is everything that comes along with it. Yeah the bag is cheap quality but hey it works and does everything like any other bag would. VERY HAPPY CUSTOMER.I got lucky:)

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i
Reviews.Author: steve martinez
Reviews.Content: I considered this package because the price was worth the items being announced, and the item description was very accurate and I am very satisfied with my order, I would definitely recommend this product to my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Barackman
Reviews.Content: Came exactly as ordered and arrived several days earlier than I expected and was able to use it right away.  Very happy with the product!

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: Cheryl
Reviews.Content: This is my second SLR camera but my first Canon and I am thrilled with this camera since purchasing in January 2013.  I thought the bundle was a great price compared to other prices just selling the camera alone.  Its' menu and camera is user friendly especially for a beginner like me and I thoroughly enjoy using all the items that were sold with the bundle especially the 300 mm lens!  I would definitely recommend this camera model.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Germano Almeida Santos
Reviews.Content: Perfect. The price of the set is attractive and product quality exceeded my expectations. I am very satisfied and recommend buying.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Shannon Ealy
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my wife for Christmas.  Was a bit leery at first and did a lot of homework.  Item arrived well within the timeframe allotted. Everything was there and in brand new condition.  Very nice equipment, not name brand(except camera and lenses), but still very nice stuff.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Great Shipping.
Reviews.Author: Peter A. Stasiek
Reviews.Content: Overall, I am in love. The came a day earlier then expect, which made me very very happy. The product is great. The bag that comes with it in my opinion isn't exactly good. I bought another bag instead Canon 2400 SLR Gadget Bag for EOS SLR Cameras. I mean this is so short... But everything is so great... I don't even need to make a long detailed review.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: brandon harris
Reviews.Content: This item came on time. I connected it and it all works well. I surely look forward to doing business with you all soon again. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great camera kit
Reviews.Author: Gary A Rodgers
Reviews.Content: Just a advertised, great product, great price! I highly recommend this product and seller. If you are looking for an excellent gift for your camera buff...this is it!

Reviews.Title: Amazon kit for the price, but the flash doesn't work.
Reviews.Author: Brittany C
Reviews.Content: Other than the price, the main reason why I chose this kit over the comparable one with a tripod is because this one came with a flash. Unfortunately the flash doesn't work. I will be contacting Cameta Camera to see if they can fix this issue and will gladly give them a better review if the follow up is helpful.

Reviews.Title: Great package for the price
Reviews.Author: Ravi R
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife and just had a professional state it was a great way to start for a newbie.

Reviews.Title: Impressionante
Reviews.Author: Nilton de Carvalho Neves
Reviews.Content: O kit vem com muitos acessórios, é realmente impressionante. O custo beneficio é ótimo e o produto excelente. As imagens feitas ficaram maravilhosas.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: An excellent product. All its accessories are high quality. The camera works very nice its easy to handle and shot a nice pictures. I recommend this product 100%

Reviews.Title: Great item!
Reviews.Author: Garrett Cooper
Reviews.Content: Camera is outstanding. My wife loves it and still uses it to this day. Very comfortable feeling and sensible extras. Great camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!!
Reviews.Author: Hicova
Reviews.Content: This camera bundle was exactly what I have been looking for to upgrade from my Nikon Coolpix DSLR. I have enjoyed using my Nikon for the past ten or so years but it was time to move up. I am still studying how to get the most out of the Canon EOS and am looking forward to becoming as comfortable with it as I have been with the Nikon. The delivery from Cameta Camera was prompt and well packaged. I will update this review when I have more experience with its use.

Reviews.Title: Too good
Reviews.Author: basant sahu
Reviews.Content: I love this Camera.. Nice pic quality, everything is good! I am happy for this product for the amount that I paid.

Reviews.Title: good product and deal
Reviews.Author: ArunKumar
Reviews.Content: Recieved the package in time.Recieved all the item listed in the bundle and observed good quality sealing and packagingOverall happy with the bundle, worth for the price.Great picture quality and its pretty easy to handle this camera. Happy snapping!!

Reviews.Title: Everything is fine
Reviews.Author: Kevin Küchler
Reviews.Content: The camera is really good and also the stuff that was in the kit....nothing was missing so I'm happy with it

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: brett
Reviews.Content: It is a great camera. I have some great pics taken with it.Ii think it is a great deal.I love it.

Reviews.Title: New?
Reviews.Author: Cyrmen
Reviews.Content: Hey there good night, i want to know if this camera and it's accesories are new or used? Thanks, bye!

Reviews.Title: Chinese parts are the worst for the camera
Reviews.Author: Jerczey
Reviews.Content: The parts it comes with are not the best for your canon... the flash is non compatible...wide angle and zoom will mostly distort the light on the camera lenses..Only one original battery..after I bought it they lowered price!!!

<4> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + Spare LP-E8 Battery + Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + Additional Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter +
.45x Wide Angle Lens (58mm) + 2x Telephoto Lens (58mm) + Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + PD Digital SLR Camera Case +
PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens with 75-300mm Lens + 16GB Card + .45x Wide Angle & 2x Telephoto Lenses + Flash + Case + Battery + Remote + (2) Filters + Accessory Kit
